scripts.docs:redoc: mkdir -p docs/api && redocly build-docs docs/openapi/bff.openapi.json --config redocly.yaml -o docs/api/bff.html && redocly build-docs docs/openapi/runs.openapi.json --config redocly.yaml -o docs/api/runs.html
scripts.docs:api: pnpm docs:openapi && pnpm docs:redoc && pnpm docs:typedoc
scripts.docs:zip: rm -f site-docs.zip && (cd docs/api && zip -r ../site-docs.zip . || true) && test -f docs/site-docs.zip && echo 'site-docs.zip ready at docs/site-docs.zip'
scripts.docs:bundle: mkdir -p docs/api && pnpm -s docs:api && pnpm -s docs:zip
scripts.snapshot: pnpm run build:datasets && node apps/tools/snapshot/dist/cli.js datasets/snapshots/manifest.yaml
scripts.guard:raw: bash -lc "! git ls-files | grep -E '^datasets/snapshots/.+?/raw/' || (echo 'raw/ tracked'; exit 1)"
scripts.test:selacc: pnpm -s run test:selacc:unit && pnpm -s run test:selacc:e2e
scripts.test:selacc:unit: vitest run --config vitest.ci.config.ts --project root tests/selacc.access.spec.ts tests/selacc.selection.spec.ts
scripts.test:selacc:e2e: SELACC_APP_MODULE_PATH=apps/bff/src/app.module GITHUB_WEBHOOK_SECRET=testsecret vitest run --config vitest.ci.config.ts --project root --include tests/selacc.webhook.e2e.spec.ts
scripts.diagrams:watch: nodemon --ext mmd --watch docs/arch/releases --exec "pnpm diagrams:build && pnpm diagrams:check"
scripts.build: turbo run build --filter=...[origin/main] || turbo run build
scripts.contracts:lint: redocly lint --config redocly.yaml docs/openapi/bff.openapi.json && redocly lint --config redocly.yaml docs/openapi/runs.openapi.json
scripts.contracts:all: pnpm contracts:openapi && pnpm contracts:jsonschema && pnpm contracts:lint
scripts.devstack:up: docker compose -f infra/docker/docker-compose.dev.yml up -d --no-build postgres redis azurite otel-collector jaeger
scripts.devstack:up:all: docker compose -f infra/docker/docker-compose.dev.yml --profile cosmos --profile vector --profile llm up -d
scripts.devstack:migrate: docker network inspect gh-triage-dev_devnet >/dev/null 2>&1 || docker compose -f infra/docker/docker-compose.dev.yml up -d --no-build postgres && docker run --rm --network gh-triage-dev_devnet -v $(pwd)/infra/migrations:/flyway/sql flyway/flyway -url=jdbc:postgresql://postgres:5432/triage -user=postgres -password=devpass migrate
scripts.devstack:test: pnpm devstack:up && wait-port 127.0.0.1:5432 && wait-port 127.0.0.1:6379 && cross-env DOTENV_CONFIG_QUIET=true DEVSTACK=1 vitest run --config vitest.full.config.ts apps/bff/test/devstack.spec.ts; code=$?; pnpm devstack:down; exit $code
scripts.db:wait: bash -lc 'for i in {1..60}; do pg_isready -h 127.0.0.1 -p 5432 -U postgres -d ghtriage && break; echo Waiting for Postgres...; sleep 1; done'
scripts.db:prepare: bash -lc 'DBURL="${DATABASE_URL:-postgresql://postgres:postgres@127.0.0.1:5432/ghtriage}"; if command -v psql >/dev/null 2>&1; then psql "$DBURL" -v ON_ERROR_STOP=1 -f infra/sql/002_ghapp.sql && psql "$DBURL" -v ON_ERROR_STOP=1 -f infra/sql/020_runs.sql && psql "$DBURL" -v ON_ERROR_STOP=1 -f infra/sql/021_run_events.sql && psql "$DBURL" -c "\\dt"; else echo "psql not found; skipping schema"; fi'
scripts.db:sql:runs: bash -lc 'DBURL="${DATABASE_URL:-postgresql://postgres:postgres@127.0.0.1:5432/ghtriage}"; psql "$DBURL" -v ON_ERROR_STOP=1 -f infra/sql/020_runs.sql && psql "$DBURL" -v ON_ERROR_STOP=1 -f infra/sql/021_run_events.sql'
scripts.db:select:runs: bash -lc 'DBURL="${DATABASE_URL:-postgresql://postgres:postgres@127.0.0.1:5432/ghtriage}"; psql "$DBURL" -v ON_ERROR_STOP=1 -P pager=off -c "select run_id, step, status, created_at from runs order by created_at desc limit 5;" && psql "$DBURL" -v ON_ERROR_STOP=1 -P pager=off -c "select run_id, code, ts from run_events order by ts desc limit 10;"'
scripts.port:kill:runs: bash -lc 'for p in 4101 4102; do fuser -k ${p}/tcp 2>/dev/null || true; lsof -t -iTCP:${p} -sTCP:LISTEN | xargs -r kill -9; for i in {1..20}; do ss -ltnp | grep -q ":${p} " && sleep 0.5 || break; done; done'
scripts.devstack:ready: pnpm devstack:up && pnpm db:wait && pnpm -w db:prepare
scripts.devstack:assert: bash -lc 'docker info >/dev/null 2>&1 || { echo "[devstack] Docker daemon not running. Start Docker Desktop or systemd service, then retry." >&2; exit 1; }'
scripts.pretest:runs: pnpm devstack:assert && pnpm devstack:up && pnpm db:wait && pnpm -w db:prepare
scripts.port:kill: bash -lc 'PORT=${PORT:?set PORT}; fuser -k ${PORT}/tcp 2>/dev/null || true; lsof -t -iTCP:${PORT} -sTCP:LISTEN | xargs -r kill -9; for i in {1..20}; do ss -ltnp | grep -q ":${PORT} " && sleep 0.5 || break; done'
scripts.db:tail:events: bash -lc 'DBURL="${DATABASE_URL:-postgresql://postgres:postgres@127.0.0.1:5432/ghtriage}"; while true; do clear; date; psql "$DBURL" -P pager=off -c "select run_id, code, ts from run_events order by ts desc limit 25;"; sleep 2; done'
scripts.contracts:openapi:yaml: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const YAML=require('yaml'); const j=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('docs/openapi/runs.openapi.json','utf8')); fs.writeFileSync('docs/openapi/runs.openapi.yaml', YAML.stringify(j));"
